label: How a Button in Tp5 is linked to muse

name: Readme for this tab
info:
the **_controller_** node and **_Touchpanel_** node
are always the first 2 nodes to be included in a project.

The function of a Controller node is
to establish connection betwween automator
and the physcial muse controller.

The function of the touch panel is to 
expose the channel code, address code of the
buttons, and other nagviation elements used 
in AMx TP5 design.

name: Readme for this tab
info:
There are 3 flows in this tabs


---
1_Turn on Relay

**Inject node** is used to the send a Boolean:True payload 
into the flow.

**UI control** node is used to establish 
linkage between the button that created in 
TP5 design and MUSE controller.

Based on the msg.payload received, the 
**Command Node** is used to trigger event.

This flow will trigger the status of a relay
to on.

---
2_Turn off Relay

The flow is the same as the above flow except
that instead of turn on the relay. This flow
will turn off the relay.

---
3_Trigger on/off feedback

**event** node will react based on the
event that it is bounded to. In this flow,it
is bound to the the relay 1's state.
Depend on the stage, a command node is used to
turn on/off the button's feedback in the Touchpanel.

name: Readme for this tab
info:
In this flow,we are creating a momentary relay.

In the **UI control** node,
if 
button == momentary
trigger == push,
the msg.payload will be True.

if 
button == momentary
trigger == release,
the msg.payload will be False.

if 
button == momentary
trigger == any,
the msg.payload will be true(push) 
then False(release).

to know the msg.payload, we can use **debug node**

name: Result of trigger set to any
conditional operator toggle between true and false
Readme for this tab
info:
When **Status Node** received payload(true), it will
then change the payload to the value of the 
control device configured in the status node

The **switch node** is used a coditional operator.
You can see it as a if-else statement.

In this flow, if the status of relay is true, it will be change to
false and if the status is false, it will change to true.

info:

Readme for this tab
info:
This flow is to be used in conjunction with 
Serial-Send.


Template node is used to take in the payload
and send out a certain format.

name: Readme for this tab
info:
The nodes are arranged in a way so the user
can read each nodes easily.

In nodeRED, we can use low code to create function.

**Function Node** is used to replace AKB with nothing.
